title: Tour Eupener Straße
descriptionStart: Welcome to the Eupener Straße Campus! In this challenge, you will explore the Eupener Straße Campus and get to know some interesting places.
descriptionEnd: You know your way around the Eupener Straße Campus.

steps.text: Which department is **not** located on the Eupener Straße Campus?
